title: Certificate Preference (com.apple.security.certificatepreference)
description: The payload that configures a certificate preference.

Name.description: An email address (in RFC 822 format) or other name for which a preferred certificate is requested.

PayloadCertificateUUID.title: Payload Certificate UUID
PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate payload within the same profile to use for the identity credential.
